name: StakeDepositContract
description: This is the Ethereum 2.0 deposit contract interface. For more information see the Phase 0 specification under https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs.

parameterDecorators.name: withdrawal_credentials
parameterDecorators.description: Commitment to a public key for withdrawals.

parameterDecorators.name: deposit_data_root
parameterDecorators.description: The SHA-256 hash of the SSZ-encoded DepositData object. Used as a protection against malformed input.

returnDecorators.description: The deposit count encoded as a little endian 64-bit number.

functionDecorators.name: get_deposit_root
functionDecorators.description: Query the current deposit root hash.

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: Query if a contract implements an interface. Interface identification is specified in ERC-165. This function uses less than 30,000 gas.

parameterDecorators.name: interfaceId
parameterDecorators.description: The interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165.

returnDecorators.description: `true` if the contract implements `interfaceId` and `interfaceId` is not 0xffffffff, `false` otherwise.
